name: The Inexperienced Exorcist [BL RPG]
description:
Axel is an inexperienced exorcist who is investigating a haunted house for the first time. There he meets a playful ghost named Ethan. Ethan tells the rookie exorcist that the best way to get rid of him is to fulfill his desires so he can depart to the afterlife in peace. Now Axel has to run around and fulfill the ghost's wishes...

2 Endings

6 CGs

30 minutes playtime

Disclaimer:

The game is mostly fluff, but it contains angst depending on the ending you get

Mentions death and depression

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChaniMK_VN

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chanimk_vn/

Website: https://chanimk19.wixsite.com/chanimk

Editor: Taylor Morphis
